vpsChecker.intro: Please answer the following questions to determine if VPS is right for you:

recommendations.pleaseAnswer: Please answer the questions to get a recommendation
recommendations.shouldChoose: ✅ Should choose VPS - VPS fits your needs
recommendations.consider: ⚠️ Consider - Can start with shared hosting or low-config VPS
recommendations.notNeeded: ❌ Don't need VPS yet - Shared hosting will be more suitable

questions.traffic: Does your Website/App have high traffic or growing traffic?
questions.control: Do you need full server control (root access)?
questions.knowledge: Do you have Linux/Windows Server knowledge or willing to learn?
questions.software: Do you need to install special software or custom configuration?
questions.outgrow: Has shared hosting stopped meeting your needs?
questions.performance: Do you need better performance than shared hosting?
questions.business: Is your Website/App e-commerce or business critical?
questions.small: Is your website very small, just a personal blog/portfolio?
questions.noLearning: Don't you want to learn about server management?
